import React from "react"; import { Navbar,Nav,NavDropdown,Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FaShoppingCart} from 'react-icons/fa'; //react-icons is imported // styling for cartCount const styles = { cartCount: { background: 'white', borderRadius: '50%', padding: '4px 5px', position: 'absolute', top:3, marginLeft:'19%', } } const Head = (props) => { let user= JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user-info')) console.warn(user) return (
{/* NAVBAR */} E-Kart
Home Contact Us About Us Fashion Electronics Grocery
Update Profile Logout {props.count}
); } export default Head;
